A Numerical Study of an Interacting Particle System End of Year 1 Report Preface

A Numerical Study of an Interacting Particle System End of Year 1 Report Tom271 2020-05-26 Preface This report is available in two versions: html and pdf. The pdf version is a traditional static report compiled in LaTeX whereas the html version allows for the addition of animations describing the motion of the particles in the systems. Generally, these allow for a much more intuitive view of whats happening, rather than relying on one-dimensional plots.
